entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Near blizzard developing this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
